activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9289
activity.text: Hey @Jacobjeevan, I've looked into the issue, and it seems to be with the backend. When fetching the response for a particular discharged patient, the `is_active` flag is incorrectly set to true. Additionally, there are missing fields value such as `"new_discharge_reason"``, `"discharge_notes"`, `"discharge_prescription"`, and `"discharge_prn_prescription"`. To address this, we could pass a parameter in the URL to indicate whether it's the discharged patient page or not.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9289
activity.text: Yup I'll do that

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9289
activity.text: Can you please assign this issue to me?

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#9270
activity.text: Hey @shivankacker, it seems that when we update fields like `onsetDate` or `symptom`, the component gets re-rendered. This is expected behavior, so I believe the test suit should be updated to account for this. Would it be okay to adjust the test suit accordingly?
